about_the_game:
Grandpa is still missing

Where are you, Grandpa? After visiting the Beach Cafe he had on the beach, and delving into his memories, it's time to continue exploring that place. Are you ready to unveil the secrets it hides? What's going on in that beach cafe?

About the game

If you like escape rooms and point & click puzzle games, you can't miss Beach Cafe II: The Escape Room. A story full of secrets and fantasy in which you will have to collect all the necessary clues to solve your grandfather's disappearance. From the stories he told you and his memories, you will have to reconstruct the events.

Features

  • Explore places full of memories about the stories your grandfather told you.
  • Advance through different scenarios using logic. Trust your instinct and make decisions, the resolution of this mystery depends on you.
  • Collect memories that will help you solve the puzzles. A wide variety of suspenseful content awaits you.
  • Be thorough - pay attention to details! This place hides a big secret, but it won't be easy to reveal it.

Can you solve the clues and escape?

This is the second installment of Beach Cafe, a series of mystery and escape rooms, to be continued in future episodes!
